name: Policy
shortDesc: The AWS::IAM::Policy resource associates an IAM policy with IAM users, roles, or groups. For more information about IAM policies, see Overview of IAM Policies in the IAM User Guide guide.

properties.name: Groups
properties.desc: The names of groups to which you want to add the policy.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.desc: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified users or groups.

properties.name: PolicyName
properties.desc: The name of the policy. If you specify multiple policies for an entity, specify unique names. For example, if you specify a list of policies for an IAM role, each policy must have a unique name.

properties.name: Roles
properties.desc: The names of AWS::IAM::Roles to attach to this policy.

properties.name: Users
properties.desc: The names of users for whom you want to add the policy.
